uproot the thistles
pull the dandelions

my itchy arm

i want to show you something so neat
i worked so hard on it

sort the books

wipe the table

do you like it?

how many unwashed cups are circulating right now?

unclog the shower drain

your friends are somewhere
passing the time
or solving some great mystery

where do you want to go today?
